trans-unit.source: %group_name% - All persons without a customer account or customers that are not logged in.
trans-unit.target: %group_name% - All persons without a customer account or customers that are not logged in.

trans-unit.source: %group_name% - All persons who placed an order through Guest Checkout.
trans-unit.target: %group_name% - All persons who placed an order through Guest Checkout.

trans-unit.target: %group_name% - All persons who created an account on this site.

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop has three default customer groups:
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop has three default customer groups:

trans-unit.source: Enable the automatic indexing of products. If you enable this feature, the products will be indexed in the search automatically when they are saved. If the feature is disabled, you will have to index products manually by using the links provided in the field set.
trans-unit.target: Enable the automatic indexing of products. If you enable this feature, the products will be indexed in the search automatically when they are saved. If the feature is disabled, you will have to index products manually by using the links provided in the field set.

trans-unit.source: By default, to search for “blouse”, you have to enter “blous”, “blo”, etc (beginning of the word) – but not “lous” (within the word).
trans-unit.target: By default, to search for “blouse”, you have to enter “blous”, “blo”, etc (beginning of the word) – but not “lous” (within the word).

trans-unit.source: With this option enabled, it also gives the good result if you search for “lous”, “ouse”, or anything contained in the word.
trans-unit.target: With this option enabled, it also gives the good result if you search for “lous”, “ouse”, or anything contained in the word.

trans-unit.source: Enable search within a whole word, rather than from its beginning only.
trans-unit.target: Enable search within a whole word, rather than from its beginning only.

trans-unit.source: It checks if the searched term is contained in the indexed word. This may be resource-consuming.
trans-unit.target: It checks if the searched term is contained in the indexed word. This may be resource-consuming.

trans-unit.source: By default, if you search "book", you will have "book", "bookcase" and "bookend".
trans-unit.target: By default, if you search "book", you will have "book", "bookcase" and "bookend".

trans-unit.source: With this option enabled, it only gives one result “book”, as exact end of the indexed word is matching.
trans-unit.target: With this option enabled, it only gives one result “book”, as exact end of the indexed word is matching.

trans-unit.source: Enable more precise search with the end of the word.
trans-unit.target: Enable more precise search with the end of the word.

trans-unit.source: It checks if the searched term is the exact end of the indexed word.
trans-unit.target: It checks if the searched term is the exact end of the indexed word.

trans-unit.source: By default, the fuzzy search is enabled. It means spelling errors are allowed, e.g. you can search for "bird" with words like "burd", "bard" or "beerd".
trans-unit.target: By default, the fuzzy search is enabled. It means spelling errors are allowed, e.g. you can search for "bird" with words like "burd", "bard" or "beerd".

trans-unit.source: Disabling this option will require exact spelling for the search to match results.
trans-unit.target: Disabling this option will require exact spelling for the search to match results.

trans-unit.source: Enable approximate string matching.
trans-unit.target: Enable approximate string matching.

trans-unit.source: Note that this option is resource-consuming: the more you search, the longer it takes.
trans-unit.target: Note that this option is resource-consuming: the more you search, the longer it takes.

trans-unit.source: Only words fewer or equal to this maximum length will be searched.
trans-unit.target: Only words fewer or equal to this maximum length will be searched.

trans-unit.source: This parameter will only be used if the fuzzy search is activated: the lower the value, the more tolerant your search will be.
trans-unit.target: This parameter will only be used if the fuzzy search is activated: the lower the value, the more tolerant your search will be.

trans-unit.source: Only words this size or larger will be indexed.
trans-unit.target: Only words this size or larger will be indexed.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the index words separated by a "|".
trans-unit.target: Please enter the index words separated by a "|".

trans-unit.source: Enter each alias separated by a comma (e.g. 'prestshop,preztashop,prestasohp').
trans-unit.target: Enter each alias separated by a comma (e.g. 'prestshop,preztashop,prestasohp').

trans-unit.source: Forbidden characters: <>;=#{}
trans-unit.target: Forbidden characters: <>;=#{}

trans-unit.source: Search this word instead.
trans-unit.target: Search this word instead.

trans-unit.source: Forbidden characters: <>;=#{}
trans-unit.target: Forbidden characters: <>;=#{}

trans-unit.source: This field does not refer to the shop name visible in the front office.
trans-unit.target: This field does not refer to the shop name visible in the front office.

trans-unit.source: Follow [1]this link[/1] to edit the shop name used on the front office.
trans-unit.target: Follow [1]this link[/1] to edit the shop name used on the front office.

trans-unit.source: You can't edit the shop group because the current shop belongs to a group with the "share" option enabled.
trans-unit.target: You can't edit the shop group because the current shop belongs to a group with the "share" option enabled.

trans-unit.source: This is the root category of the store that you've created. To define a new root category for your store, [1]please click here[/1].
trans-unit.target: This is the root category of the store that you've created. To define a new root category for your store, [1]please click here[/1].

trans-unit.source: By selecting associated categories, you are choosing to share the categories between shops. Once associated between shops, any alteration of this category will impact every shop.
trans-unit.target: By selecting associated categories, you are choosing to share the categories between shops. Once associated between shops, any alteration of this category will impact every shop.

trans-unit.source: Upload an icon from your computer (File type: .gif, suggested size: 16x16).
trans-unit.target: Upload an icon from your computer (File type: .gif, suggested size: 16x16).

trans-unit.source: Only letters, numbers and underscores ("_") are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Only letters, numbers and underscores ("_") are allowed.

trans-unit.source: Email template for both .html and .txt.
trans-unit.target: Email template for both .html and .txt.

trans-unit.source: Whether or not to display this store.
trans-unit.target: Whether or not to display this store.

trans-unit.target: Storefront picture.

trans-unit.source: Displayed in emails sent to customers.
trans-unit.target: Displayed in emails sent to customers.

trans-unit.target: Shop registration information (e.g. SIRET or RCS).

trans-unit.target: Contact name (e.g. Customer Support).

trans-unit.target: Emails will be sent to this address.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, all messages will be saved in the "Customer Service" page under the "Customer" menu.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, all messages will be saved in the "Customer Service" page under the "Customer" menu.

trans-unit.source: After a customer logs in, you can recall and display the content of his/her last shopping cart.
trans-unit.target: After a customer logs in, you can recall and display the content of his/her last shopping cart.

trans-unit.source: Send an email with a summary of the account information after registration.
trans-unit.target: Send an email with a summary of the account information after registration.

trans-unit.source: Minimum time required between two requests for a password reset.
trans-unit.target: Minimum time required between two requests for a password reset.

trans-unit.source: Activate or deactivate B2B mode. When this option is enabled, B2B features will be made available.
trans-unit.target: Activate or deactivate B2B mode. When this option is enabled, B2B features will be made available.

trans-unit.source: Display or not the birth date field.
trans-unit.target: Display or not the birth date field.

trans-unit.source: Display or not the partner offers tick box, to receive offers from the store's partners.
trans-unit.target: Display or not the partner offers tick box, to receive offers from the store's partners.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you deactivate your store while performing maintenance. Note that it will not disable the webservice.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you deactivate your store while performing maintenance. Note that it will not disable the webservice.

trans-unit.source: Allow IP addresses to access the store, even in maintenance mode. Use a comma to separate them (e.g. 42.24.4.2,127.0.0.1,99.98.97.96).
trans-unit.target: Allow IP addresses to access the store, even in maintenance mode. Use a comma to separate them (e.g. 42.24.4.2,127.0.0.1,99.98.97.96).

trans-unit.source: Display a customized message when the store is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Display a customized message when the store is disabled.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, admins will access the store front office without storing their IP.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, admins will access the store front office without storing their IP.

trans-unit.source: If you own an SSL certificate for your shop's domain name, you can activate SSL encryption (https://) for customer account identification and order processing.
trans-unit.target: If you own an SSL certificate for your shop's domain name, you can activate SSL encryption (https://) for customer account identification and order processing.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, all the pages of your shop will be SSL-secured.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, all the pages of your shop will be SSL-secured.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable token in the Front Office to improve PrestaShop's security.
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable token in the Front Office to improve PrestaShop's security.

trans-unit.source: Allow iframes on text fields like product description. We recommend that you leave this option disabled.
trans-unit.target: Allow iframes on text fields like product description. We recommend that you leave this option disabled.

trans-unit.source: Clean the HTML content on text fields. We recommend that you leave this option enabled.
trans-unit.target: Clean the HTML content on text fields. We recommend that you leave this option enabled.

trans-unit.source: You can choose among 6 different ways of rounding prices. "Round up away from zero ..." is the recommended behavior.
trans-unit.target: You can choose among 6 different ways of rounding prices. "Round up away from zero ..." is the recommended behavior.

trans-unit.source: You can choose when to round prices: either on each item, each line or the total (of an invoice, for example).
trans-unit.target: You can choose when to round prices: either on each item, each line or the total (of an invoice, for example).

trans-unit.source: Enable suppliers page on your front office even when its module is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Enable suppliers page on your front office even when its module is disabled.

trans-unit.source: Enable brands page on your front office even when its module is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Enable brands page on your front office even when its module is disabled.

trans-unit.source: Enable best sellers page on your front office even when its respective module is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Enable best sellers page on your front office even when its respective module is disabled.

trans-unit.source: The multistore feature allows you to manage several front offices from a single back office. If this feature is enabled, a Multistore page is available in the Advanced Parameters menu.
trans-unit.target: The multistore feature allows you to manage several front offices from a single back office. If this feature is enabled, a Multistore page is available in the Advanced Parameters menu.

trans-unit.source: Display an overview of the addresses, shipping method and cart just before the order button (required in some European countries).
trans-unit.target: Display an overview of the addresses, shipping method and cart just before the order button (required in some European countries).

trans-unit.source: Allow guest visitors to place an order without registering.
trans-unit.target: Allow guest visitors to place an order without registering.

trans-unit.source: Disable the option to allow customers to reorder in one click from the order history page (required in some European countries).
trans-unit.target: Disable the option to allow customers to reorder in one click from the order history page (required in some European countries).

trans-unit.source: Set to 0 to disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: Set to 0 to disable this feature.

trans-unit.source: Automatically updates the shipping costs when you edit an order.
trans-unit.target: Automatically updates the shipping costs when you edit an order.

trans-unit.source: Allow the customer to ship orders to multiple addresses. This option will convert the customer's cart into one or more orders.
trans-unit.target: Allow the customer to ship orders to multiple addresses. This option will convert the customer's cart into one or more orders.

trans-unit.source: It allows you to delay shipping if your customers request it.
trans-unit.target: It allows you to delay shipping if your customers request it.

trans-unit.source: Require customers to accept or decline terms of service before processing an order.
trans-unit.target: Require customers to accept or decline terms of service before processing an order.

trans-unit.source: Choose the page which contains your store's terms and conditions of use.
trans-unit.target: Choose the page which contains your store's terms and conditions of use.

trans-unit.source: The order status will be set to "On backorder" for new orders containing products that are out of stock.
trans-unit.target: The order status will be set to "On backorder" for new orders containing products that are out of stock.

trans-unit.source: Suggest gift-wrapping to customers.
trans-unit.target: Suggest gift-wrapping to customers.

trans-unit.target: Set a price for gift wrapping.

trans-unit.target: Set a tax for gift wrapping.

trans-unit.source: Suggest recycled packaging to customer.
trans-unit.target: Suggest recycled packaging to customer.

trans-unit.target: Remember to regenerate email templates in [1]Design > Email theme[/1] after enabling or disabling this feature.

trans-unit.source: Catalog mode disables the shopping cart on your store. Visitors will be able to browse your products catalog, but not buy them.
trans-unit.target: Catalog mode disables the shopping cart on your store. Visitors will be able to browse your products catalog, but not buy them.

trans-unit.source: Display product prices when in catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: Display product prices when in catalog mode.

trans-unit.target: To hide prices for a specific group, go to [1]Customer Settings > Groups[/1].

trans-unit.target: characters

trans-unit.target: How to calculate quantity discounts.

trans-unit.source: When active, friendly URL will be updated on every save.
trans-unit.target: When active, friendly URL will be updated on every save.

trans-unit.source: Enable this option if you want to activate by default all your manually created new products.
trans-unit.target: Enable this option if you want to activate by default all your manually created new products.

trans-unit.source: If a customer meets multiple conditions, specific prices will be applied in this order of priority, unless a different order has been set for a particular product.
trans-unit.target: If a customer meets multiple conditions, specific prices will be applied in this order of priority, unless a different order has been set for a particular product.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the default behavior for all disabled products. The product page can display a "Discontinued" message or an error page. You can also specify which HTTP response is sent to users. This can be set specifically for each product.
trans-unit.target: You can specify the default behavior for all disabled products. The product page can display a "Discontinued" message or an error page. You can also specify which HTTP response is sent to users. This can be set specifically for each product.

trans-unit.source: Display the "%add_to_cart_label%" button when a product has attributes
trans-unit.target: Display the "%add_to_cart_label%" button when a product has attributes

trans-unit.source: Display or hide the "%add_to_cart_label%" button on category pages for products that have attributes forcing customers to see product details.
trans-unit.target: Display or hide the "%add_to_cart_label%" button on category pages for products that have attributes forcing customers to see product details.

trans-unit.source: In the volume discount table on the product page, display the discounted unit price instead of the unit discount. E.g. If you sell a product for $10 with a discount of $2 from 3 items purchased, the discounted unit price ($8) will be displayed instead of the unit discount ($2).
trans-unit.target: In the volume discount table on the product page, display the discounted unit price instead of the unit discount. E.g. If you sell a product for $10 with a discount of $2 from 3 items purchased, the discounted unit price ($8) will be displayed instead of the unit discount ($2).

trans-unit.source: Number of products displayed per page. Default is 12
trans-unit.target: Number of products displayed per page. Default is 12

trans-unit.source: The order in which products are displayed in the product list.
trans-unit.target: The order in which products are displayed in the product list.

trans-unit.target: When selling packs of products, how do you want your stock to be calculated?

trans-unit.source: If an attribute is not available in every product combination, it will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: If an attribute is not available in every product combination, it will not be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Set to "0" to disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: Set to "0" to disable this feature.

trans-unit.source: Enable this option if you want to display your product's attributes in its meta title.
trans-unit.target: Enable this option if you want to display your product's attributes in its meta title.

trans-unit.source: Enable this option only if your server allows URL rewriting (recommended).
trans-unit.target: Enable this option only if your server allows URL rewriting (recommended).

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting (mod_rewrite) is not active on your server, or it is not possible to check your server configuration. If you want to use Friendly URLs, you must activate this mod.
trans-unit.target: URL rewriting (mod_rewrite) is not active on your server, or it is not possible to check your server configuration. If you want to use Friendly URLs, you must activate this mod.

trans-unit.source: Enable this option if you want to allow accented characters in your friendly URLs. You should only activate this option if you are using non-Latin characters; for all the Latin charsets, your SEO will be better without this option.
trans-unit.target: Enable this option if you want to allow accented characters in your friendly URLs. You should only activate this option if you are using non-Latin characters; for all the Latin charsets, your SEO will be better without this option.

trans-unit.source: Enable this option only if you have problems with URL rewriting.
trans-unit.target: Enable this option only if you have problems with URL rewriting.

trans-unit.source: Some of PrestaShop's features might not work correctly with a specific configuration of Apache's mod_security module. We recommend to turn it off.
trans-unit.target: Some of PrestaShop's features might not work correctly with a specific configuration of Apache's mod_security module. We recommend to turn it off.

trans-unit.source: [1]Make[/1] sure partner offers are not set as required in the [2]Customers[/2] section of the back office before disabling them. Otherwise, new customers won't be able to create an account and [1]proceed[/1] to checkout.
